metadata.title: CVE-2024-3024 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in appneta tcpreplay up to 4.4.4. It has beenclassified as problematic. This affects the function get_layer4_v6 of thefile /tcpreplay/src/common/get.c. The manipulation leads to heap-basedbuffer overflow. Attacking locally is a requirement. The exploit has beendisclosed to the public and may be used. The identifier VDB-258333 wasassigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early aboutthis disclosure but did not respond in any way.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
